item.description:
So, it turns out that it looks as though The Local isn't open yet - d'oh! Let's move this party to Paddy's Pub. It's on my list of places to try and it's in West Newton. From all the 'Net chatter, it seems like a cool Irish bar with a great menu.

Want more details? Check out their website: http://www.oharas.us/...

Plus, we're right around the corner from Waltham - trying a new place nearby sounds great. I hope you guys can make it!

Note: If you haven't already, please bring a donation of $5 each to help cover the costs of running the group. I appreciate your help in keeping us going.
item.how_to_find_us: Call me. 413-695-2121. We'll try to get a table.
item.name: Checking out Paddy's Pub
